enum  features {
  strongNumbers = 0x000000010, footnotes = 0x000000020, language = 0x000000040, textColor = 0x000000080,
  highlightedVerseColor = 0x000000100, verseNumberColor = 0x000000200, backgroundColor = 0x000000400, font = 0x000000800,
  headings = 0x000001600, morphTags = 0x000003200
}
enum  events {
  strongNumbersChanged = strongNumbers, footnotesChanged = footnotes, languageChanged = language, textColorChanged = textColor,

Detailed Description

Base class for all Sword based presneters The base class for all Sword based presenters.

Author(s):
The BibleTime team

Member Function Documentation

void CSwordPresenter::closeEvent ( QCloseEvent * e ) [protected, virtual]
 

Is called when the presenter should be closed.

To delete the presenter it emits "close(CPresenter*)".

void CSwordPresenter::initAccels ( ) [protected, virtual]
 

Initializes the accelerators used by this windows.

Derived classes have to call this function too if the reimplemented this function. e.g. 

            //init own additional accelerators
     CSwordPresenter::initAccel();

Reimplemented in CBiblePresenter, CCommentaryPresenter, and CLexiconPresenter.
